snippet: The company attributed the net loss to writing down the value of ST-Ericsson, an unprofitable smartphone component venture with the French chip maker STMicroelectronics.
abstract: Ericsson reports fourth-quarter operating profit of 4.8 billion kronor, up 17 percent from year-ago period; figure excludes 6.8 billion kronor write-off against losses at its ST-Ericsson subsidiary; sales in three months through December 2012 rose 5 percent to 66.9 billion kronor, or $10.5 billion.
lead_paragraph: The company attributed the net loss to writing down the value of ST-Ericsson, an unprofitable smartphone component venture with the French chip maker STMicroelectronics.

headline.main: Ericsson Posts Loss, but Sales Increase
headline.print_headline: Ericsson Posts Loss, But Sales Increase
